mail:
Subject: Recommendation of two hotels for your upcoming trip!

Dear Enzo,

I hope this email finds you well. I'm writing to recommend two hotels for your upcoming trip. Based on your preferences, I believe that the InterContinental Madrid and the Comfort Hotel Aeroport Lyon St Exupery would be perfect for your needs.

The InterContinental Madrid is a 5-star hotel located in the heart of the city. It offers luxurious amenities and a high level of service. The Habitación Doble Estándar room type is available from 17:00:00 to 23:00:00.

The Comfort Hotel Aeroport Lyon St Exupery is a 3-star hotel located near the airport. It offers comfortable rooms and a convenient location for those arriving or departing from Lyon. The Standard Double Room is available from 10:00:00 to 16:00:00.

I hope this information is helpful in planning your trip. Please let me know if you have any questions or if there's anything else I can assist you with.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
